item.title: k8s 源码分析: ReplicaSet 控制器
item.description: 0x01 RS 控制器 func (rsc *ReplicaSetController) manageReplicas(filteredPods []*v1.Pod, rs *extensions.ReplicaSet) error { // 当前 pod 数量，期望 pod 数量 diff := len(filteredPods) - int(*(rs.Spec.Replicas)) rsKey, err := controller.KeyFunc(rs) if err != nil { utilruntime.HandleError(fmt.Errorf("Couldn't get key for %v %#v: %v", rsc.Kind, rs, err)) return nil } if diff < 0 { // 当前 pod 数量 < 期望 pod 数量 // 需要增加 pod diff *= -1 if diff > rsc.
